skillTree.localised_description: At times, this servant of Khorne storms across the battlefield with arrows lodged in his chest. However, they seem to do little but further stoke the raging fire of his wrath.
Fluttering and flouncing into battle is the way of the weak and self-indulgent. War should be waged Kharneth's way – with pure, unbridled savagery.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Slaaneshi factions
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Slaaneshi factions

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: When Karanak finds his prey other Flesh Hounds appear beside him, drawn to the battlefield by the glory of the hunt.

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

ui_effects.localised_text: Summons a unit of Flesh Hounds of Khorne
Activates automatically when conditions are met

effects.description:
Leadership: +10 for Flesh Hounds of Khorne units
	(all units in army)

Physical Resistance: +15 for Flesh Hounds of Khorne units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: The hunt begins as Karanak's three snouts taste the air for a trace of his prey. He paces to and fro, growling and snarling as each head in turn savours a portion of the scent. Each can track Karanak's quarry in a different fashion.
The first head can follow the trail through space and can track the victim over plain, forest, mountain, and other environments too bizarre to describe.
The second can follow the scent through time, back into the past to the very creation of everything that is, or forward to the end of the universe.

effects.description:
Skulls gained from kills: +8%
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: The final head tracks the quarry through his own thoughts, pursuing through dreamscapes and delusions. Of the three heads it is the last that is most dangerous, for the first two can be fooled by those with the wit to do so, but only the insane can run beyond the trace of their own mind.

The most powerful of the Lord of Battle's daemons act as consuits to his hellish domain in the Realm of Chaos. The rageful energies that radiate from these champions rouse all entities born of that dread place to acts of unparalleled savagery.
When the bloodlust and frenzy are at their utmost levels, minor wounds are healed by the Blood God's towering, unassailable will.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit.

skillTree.localised_description: When a huge swathe of rage and violence descends upon the unready, very few survivors are left in its wake.
No foe remains a threat once torn limb from bloody limb!
"KILL! KILL THEM ALL!"
"Raze it all to the ground! Leave nothing standing!"
With every other thought squeezed from his mind, there is naught left of this one but the screaming song of slaughter.
Death, malice, butchery and murder – the enemies of Khorne shall have it all.
"None shall run far! None shall be able to hide! All will come to sufferance!"
"Modulistic terror – a vast, sadistic feast. The only way to exit is going piece by piece."
All will know agony, pulverised by the inescapable grip of the Blood God's hatred.
Karanak is Khorne's chosen hunter, unleashed to search out those who have offered insult to his colossal pride.

effects.description: Unique ability: "Prey of the Blood God"

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Spread Corruption action: Khorne corruption is increased by an additional 1
Spread Corruption action: Khorne corruption is increased by an additional 2
Spread Corruption action: Khorne corruption is increased by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.description: Vanguard Deployment||This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

ui_effects.localised_text: Summons a unit of Flesh Hounds of Khorne
Activates automatically when conditions are met

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit.

items.colour_text: Karanak's Collar of Khorne is thicker and heavier than those of his pack. Enchantments of spite are layered over those of abjuration, making the hound almost immune to callow sorcery.

effects.description: Unique ability: "Brass Collar of Bloody Vengeance"

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Greatest of the Flesh Hounds, Karanak is the three-headed guard-beast that prowls the throne room of Khorne. Ever watchful, ever hungry, he is the physical manifestation of the Blood God's wrathful vengeance.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -10% for Flesh Hounds of Khorne units
	(all units in army)

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base
